Text: Equity Derivative Meeting Minutes Cc attached a copy of the minutes of the October meeting of the North American Equity Derivatives Committee Also attached is a copy of the FASBs Exposure Draft Liabilities and Equity as referred to in the minutes Louise Marshall Assistant Director of Policy for the Americas International Swaps and Derivatives Association Fifth Ave New York NY Tel Fax edminutesdoc Edfidoc edminutesdoc Edfidoc

Memo to Board re Trading Practice Issues Cc In the wake of last weeks disaster we have had numerous requests for contingency decisions on issues of a trading practice nature We are compiling a list of these questions for review by ISDAs Trading Practice Committee chaired by Jonathan Moulds at Bank of America If your firm has experienced or if you are aware of any such issues in relation to the market disruptions eg how to establish CMSCMT rates for those days please would you be prepared to raise them at tomorrows Board Meeting If necessary ISDA may subsequently ask its Trading Practice Advisory Group to convene to address these issues Louise Marshall Policy Director International Swaps and Derivatives Association Fifth Ave New York NY Tel Fax
